@graph.name: Olivier S. G. Pauwels
@graph.description:
Besides being curator of the rich and diverse recent vertebrate collections of the RBINS, I work on the conservation, biomonitoring, ecology and systematics of Southeast Asian, Eurasian and Afrotropical herpetofaunas and other vertebrates. For more details on current research projects, more pdf files and photos of all reptile (85+), amphibian (10+) and insect taxa I co-described, pls see WWW.PAUWELSOLIVIER.COM. 
Feel free to contact me for information and collaborations.
